Ministry of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation (MOFTEC)
pinyin: Dui4 wai4 Mao4 yi4 Jing1 ji4 He2 zuo4 bu4

definition: Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries (CPAFFC)
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Dui4 wai4 You3 hao3 Xie2 hui4
containing_words.word: 中国人民对外友好协会

definition: University of International Business and Economics
pinyin: Dui4 wai4 Jing1 ji4 Mao4 yi4 Da4 xue2

definition: CCP central committee's external affairs department (i.e. Chinese communist party's foreign office)

sentences.english: In opening wider to the outside world, we must pay great attention to safeguarding our national economic security.
sentences.chinese: 在扩大对外开放中，要十分注意维护国家经济安全。

sentences.english: The part of 3th discusses the role of the theory of comparative advantage for Chinese foreign trade .
sentences.chinese: 第三部分论述了比较优势理论对中国对外贸易的作用。

sentences.english: S-IV-37: How is the treatment situation for foreign ethnic groups in Germany?
sentences.chinese: 德国对外来种族群体的治疗状况如何？

sentences.english: Moreover, it is one of the locations opening to the outside world on the Liaodong Peninsula.
sentences.chinese: 同时，它也是辽东半岛对外开放的窗口之一。

sentences.english: The enterprises that have real transactions and need to pay foreign exchange to the outside shall be allowed to purchase foreign exchanges in advance.
sentences.chinese: 允许有真实交易背景需对外支付的企业提前购汇。

sentences.english: Let's look at China's history. Does China have the tradition and culture of aggression and expansion?
sentences.chinese: 历史地看，中国有对外侵略扩张的传统和文化吗？

sentences.english: IX. The International Situation and Our External Work.
We will promote the coordinated development of overseas Chinese investment and the utilization of foreign capital in China.
sentences.chinese: 推动对外投资和利用外资协调发展。

sentences.english: The war brought all foreign trade to a standstill .
sentences.chinese: 战争使所有的对外贸易停顿下来了。

sentences.english: This paper examines the theory by analyzing the practices of German foreign policy.
sentences.chinese: 本文通过分析德国对外政策的实践评介了这一理论。

sentences.english: Lu'anzhou port under construction will be the largest gateway to the outside world of Changzhou.
sentences.chinese: 在建的常州录安洲港，是常州最大的对外开放门户。

sentences.english: He says his accusers are trying to discredit government foreign-aid policies.
sentences.chinese: 他说他的责难者试图使政府的对外援助政策名声扫地。

sentences.english: Article 67 The State encourages foreign exchange and cooperation in education.
sentences.chinese: 第六十七条国家鼓励开展教育对外交流与合作。

sentences.english: Our company situates in Shenzhen for foreign business contact.
sentences.chinese: 公司设在深圳市，负责对外业务联系。

sentences.english: Fourthly, to break the blockade from the all-round opening up.
sentences.chinese: 第四，从打破封锁到全方位对外开放。

sentences.english: Industry and trade with foreign countries became prosperous, woolen cloth was on sale in European countries.
sentences.chinese: 城市手工业和对外贸易都相当繁盛，呢绒行销欧洲。
